# General Feature Specification Template

This template is used by the SpecCreator agent to generate detailed feature specifications based on user requirements.

## Feature Name
[Insert Feature Name Here]

## Description
[Provide a brief description of the feature, including its purpose and high-level functionality.]

## Requirements
[List the functional and non-functional requirements for the feature.]
- Requirement 1: [Description]
- Requirement 2: [Description]
- ...

## Acceptance Criteria
[Define the criteria that must be met for the feature to be considered complete.]
- Given [condition], when [action], then [expected result]
- ...

## User Stories
[Break down the feature into user stories.]
- As a [user type], I want [functionality] so that [benefit]
- ...

## Technical Details
[Outline the technical implementation details, such as architecture, APIs, data models, etc.]
- Architecture: [Description]
- APIs: [List of endpoints or interfaces]
- Data Models: [Key entities and relationships]
- Code Structure: [Proposed packages, classes, etc.]
- ...

## Dependencies
[List any dependencies on other features, services, or external systems.]
- Dependency 1: [Description]
- ...

## Testing Strategy
[Describe the approach to testing the feature.]
- Unit Tests: [Coverage and key tests]
- Integration Tests: [Scenarios]
- User Acceptance Tests: [Criteria]
- ...
